content:
Based on the information provided, here is a possible template for a motion to dismiss:

---

IN THE [INSERT NAME OF COURT] COURT OF [INSERT JURISDICTION]

[INSERT PLAINTIFF NAMES],

Plaintiffs,

v.

[INSERT DEFENDANT NAME],

Defendant.

Case No. [INSERT CASE NUMBER]

MOTION TO DISMISS

NOW COMES the Defendant, [INSERT DEFENDANT NAME], and hereby moves this Honorable Court to dismiss the Complaint filed by the Plaintiffs, [INSERT PLAINTIFF NAMES], pursuant to Rule [INSERT RULE NUMBER] of the [INSERT NAME OF COURT] Rules of Civil Procedure, on the grounds that the Complaint fails to state a claim upon which relief can be granted.

FACTS

[INSERT BRIEF SUMMARY OF FACTS]

ARGUMENT

The Complaint filed by the Plaintiffs fails to state a claim upon which relief can be granted. The Plaintiffs have not alleged any facts that could establish a cause of action against the Defendant.

First, the Plaintiffs' claims are barred by the terms of the warranty. The warranty explicitly states that any repairs must be done at an authorized dealership. However, the Plaintiffs chose to change the oil themselves, which could have caused damage to the vehicle.

Second, the Plaintiffs have not alleged any facts to suggest that the Defendant was responsible for the alleged water entry problem. The service manager, Josef Schmidt, informed the Plaintiffs that the customer service department of Volkswagen denied responsibility, and attributed the problem to the Plaintiffs' failure to clear the area below the windshield of leaves and other debris. The Plaintiffs have not provided any evidence to refute this claim or to suggest that the water entry problem was caused by a defect in the vehicle.

CONCLUSION

For the foregoing reasons, the Defendant respectfully requests that this Honorable Court dismiss the Complaint filed by the Plaintiffs.

Respectfully submitted,

[INSERT DEFENDANT NAME]

By: [INSERT DEFENDANT ATTORNEY NAME]

[INSERT DEFENDANT ATTORNEY BAR NUMBER]

[INSERT DEFENDANT ATTORNEY ADDRESS]

[INSERT DEFENDANT ATTORNEY PHONE NUMBER]

[INSERT DEFENDANT ATTORNEY EMAIL]
